name: Quarantine 2
description:
Official HUB/Server Access

Fight alone or with your friends against a never ending army of infected. Can you survive?

Quarantine 2 is a reboot of the original Quarantine with the intention of improving existing features. You and 3 other players must complete tasks and slay hordes of the undead in order to survive!

Quarantine 2 features two playable game modes
A to B: Players will start out in a safehouse, and must reach the next safehouse in order to win. There will be several objectives players must complete in order to progress further!

Defend The Throne: This is the classic game mode featured in the original Quarantine. Players must survive as long as possible while rounds progress.

Several zombies throughout the game have mutated gaining additional powers. Boomer's charge at players with exploding bile that slows and damages all nearby players!
Spitter's keep their distance while spewing acid at players, be careful! The acid bile will alert the horde!

Customize your own game controls to fit your gamestyle.

Mix and match weapon attachments to upgrade your weapon loadout!

Includes customizable characters! Level up your character to progress and unlock new character sprites.
